text: The reed which bends in the wind is stronger than the oak which breaks in a storm.
The wound is the place where the Light enters you.
A true friend is one who throws a rug over your mistakes, not one who pulls the rug out from under you.
The enemy of my enemy is my friend... until they become my enemy too.
Patience is the key to paradise, but impatience is often more entertaining.
A known mistake is better than an unknown truth.
One hand cannot clap alone. Neither can it hold a cup of tea properly.
The bee stings and dies. The wasp stings and laughs. Choose your battles wisely.
A tree is known by its fruit, not by its leaves. A person is known by their actions, not their words.
He who knows not and knows not that he knows not is a fool - shun him. He who knows not and knows that he knows not is a student - teach him.
The antidote for fifty enemies is one friend. The antidote for one enemy who was once a friend is impossible to find.
Let your best be for your friend. If you forge swords, give him the best sword. If you make wine, give him the best cup. And never tell him about the others.
Man is defined not by what he takes, but by what he gives.
The highest form of wisdom is kindness.
Al-nawm sultan yudawi qulub al-mut'abin - Sleep is a sultan that heals the hearts of the weary.
Al-nawm yamsah humum al-ams wa yujaddid amal al-ghad - Sleep erases yesterday's worries and renews tomorrow's hope.
Al-nawm jisr bayna al-ta'ab wal-nashat, ya'buruhu al-mar' kull layla liyulad min jadid - Sleep is a bridge between fatigue and vitality, crossed each night to be born anew.
